title: Can Maxine Waters help Trump Bank with the recordings if the Democrats take the house?
subtitle: Maxine Waters is on the line to become Chairman of the Financial Services Committee of the House of Representatives if the Democrats take that room - a position that comes with broad summoning authorities.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: If Democrats have obtained majority in the House of Representatives, Maxine Waters may become Chairman of the Committee with the power to call President Trump's bank records.
